entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -21.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Aupaluk Airport 12:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -21.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.7 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -27
Dewpoint: -23.8°C
Wind: SW 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then light snow. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Light snow and blowing snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Light snow and blowing snow. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 5.
